## Live Website Link: https://melody-makers-camp.web.app/

# Melody Makers Camp: Music School Website

![Melody Makers Camp Logo](data:image/png;base64,)

Melody Makers Camp is a summer music school that offers a wide range of music classes and activities for students of all ages. Our website provides a user-friendly platform for students to enroll in classes, explore talented instructors, and manage their learning journey. The website design is visually appealing, with a unique and captivating layout that enhances the user experience.

## Key Features

### Registration and Login System

- User-friendly login and registration pages with email, password, and social login options.
- Password field with the option to hide/unhide the password.
- Registration form validation with error messages for password requirements.
- Secure authentication using JWT tokens.

### Homepage

- Engaging top slider section with relevant text, images, and messages.
- Showcase popular classes based on enrollment, featuring attractive class images.
- Highlight top instructors based on the number of students in their classes.
- Extra section with captivating animations and effects to enhance user engagement.

### Instructors Page

- Display all instructors with their images, names, email addresses, and optional class information.
- Option to view classes taught by each instructor by clicking the "See Classes" button.

### Classes Page

- Show all approved classes with their images, names, instructor names, available seats, and prices.
- Select button for users to enroll in classes.
- Login prompt for users not logged in before selecting a course.
- Highlight class cards with a red background if there are no available seats.

### Student Dashboard

- Private dashboard accessible only by students.
- View selected classes, including relevant information and options to delete or pay for the class.
- Payment page for finalizing class payments.
- My Enrolled Classes section to display all successfully enrolled classes.
- Payment history page showing sorted payment records for the student.

### Instructor Dashboard

- Private dashboard accessible only by instructors.
- Add a Class page with a form to create new classes.
- My Classes section to manage and view added classes, including status, enrolled students, feedback, and update options.

### Admin Dashboard

- Private dashboard accessible only by administrators.
- Manage Classes page to display all classes added by instructors, including class details, status, and action buttons for approval, denial, and feedback.
- Manage Users page to view and modify user roles (student, instructor, admin).

### Additional Features

- Responsive design for optimal viewing on various devices.
- Dark/light theme toggle for the home page (optional for the entire website).
- Implementation of tanstack query (react-query) for efficient data fetching.
- Integration of Axios for API calls.
- Use of react-hook-form for enhanced form handling and validation.
- Environment variable usage for both client-side and server-side configurations.
- Custom 404 page with captivating image/animation and a back-to-home button.

## Technologies and Packages Used

- React.js: JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
- Node.js: Server-side runtime environment for JavaScript.
- Express.js: Web application framework for Node.js.
- MongoDB: NoSQL database for storing website data.
- JWT (JSON Web Token): Secure token-based authentication.
- React Router: Library for routing in React applications.
- Framer Motion: Animation library for creating engaging user interactions.
- React Hook Form: Library for flexible and efficient form handling.
- React Query: Data fetching and caching library for optimized API calls.
- Axios: HTTP client for making API requests.
- DaisyUI: Utility-first CSS framework for customizing component designs.
- HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
